title: How to Sync Your Mobile Device to Your Fallout 4 Profile

steps.headline: Download the Pip-Boy app.
steps.description: It is available on iPhone, Android, and Windows phone devices.

steps.headline: Start Fallout 4.
steps.description: Before you create a profile, make sure the Pip-Boy App setting in Gameplay Settings is enabled.

steps.headline: Begin the game.
steps.description: Create your character, and play until you receive your Pip-Boy from the dead Vault-Tec scientist.

steps.headline: Start the Pip-Boy app.
steps.description: Wait for it to finish loading as it searches for a console to connect to.

steps.headline: Select the console you wish to connect to.
steps.description: Your profile will now be synced to your phone.

steps.headline: Have fun with your Pip-Boy.
steps.description: All changes in-game and out of game will be tracked and saved for the next time.

text: Download the Pip-Boy app. It is available on iPhone, Android, and Windows phone devices. Start Fallout 4. Before you create a profile, make sure the Pip-Boy App setting in Gameplay Settings is enabled. Begin the game. Create your character, and play until you receive your Pip-Boy from the dead Vault-Tec scientist. Start the Pip-Boy app. Wait for it to finish loading as it searches for a console to connect to. Select the console you wish to connect to. Your profile will now be synced to your phone. Have fun with your Pip-Boy. All changes in-game and out of game will be tracked and saved for the next time.
